alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 01 at 8:44AM HST until May 02 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS ABOVE 12500 FEET ELEVATION... .A moist unstable airmass will bring periods of freezing rain and drizzle, as well as the snow to the Big Island summits today and tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain, drizzle and snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are possible along with light ice accumulations. * WHERE...Big Island Summits above 12500 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
